text: Erythroxylum echinodendron is an extinct in the wild species of plant in the Erythroxylaceae family. It was endemic to Cuba. ==References== * *IUCN Red List of all Threatened Species echinodendron Category:Endemic flora of Cuba Category:Extinct flora of North America Category:Plants extinct in the wild Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Erythroxylum echinodendron
